text: @realDonaldTrump Your vanity is keeping you from wearing a mask around people who are vulnerable to the virus.  People you are close to in your administration are now getting sick.  Stop being so vain and wear a fucking mask!  You are responsible for the biggest coronavirus mess in the world.
